Hello,
This tic tac toe game was designed and developed by Smart Joseph, an ALC 2.0 beginner from Uyo, Nigeria. 

Check it out here:
https://github.com/SmartJoseph/SmartTicTacToe

HOW TO PLAY
Click on the grid boxes to play.
The first player uses the X symbol, while the opponent uses the O symbol.

Win - the user wins by placing three or more Xs or Os depending on the square grid in a horizontal, vertical or diagonal row.
Draw - If none of the players has three in a row.

GAME BUTTONS
Back - Clicking this button ends the game and takes you back to the menu

New Game - Clicking this button allows you to start a new gaming session

Help - Clicking this button opens this help menu you are currently reading

Options - This button takes you to a view where you can set the game sound to on/off
